page.title: 08Colvend: Events
page.content: In Colvend and Rockcliffe we have three special events in a year. They are usually organised by the Sports Committee. In the summer holidays we have the Sports day. There are special races and ordinary races in order of age, a mini-marathon race - and lots of food and drink. Hallowe'en is on October 31st. We have a party with games and a fancy- dress competition. People dress up because it is the night of witches and wizards. Guy Fawkes' Night is on November 5th. We go down to the beach and watch the bonfire and the fireworks. I like the rockets best.
